solution_line_template: The total amount of money that she lost is ${lost_roulette}+${lost_blackjack} = $<<{lost_roulette}+{lost_blackjack}={total_lost}>>{total_lost}
If she remained with ${total_lost}, she initially had ${total_lost}+${remaining} = $<<{total_lost}+{remaining}={initial_money}>>{initial_money}
